recipe: Egg Onion Omelette: Beat eggs, sauté chopped onions, pour eggs, cook until fluffy.
Aloo Pyaz Sabzi: Fry onions, add potatoes, spices, and cook until soft.
Tomato Egg Bhurji: Cook tomatoes with spices, add eggs, scramble well.
Vegetable Fried Rice: Stir-fry vegetables, add cooked rice, soy sauce, and mix well.
